options: Temperature has no effect on batteries
Extreme cold or heat can reduce range and charging speed

questions.question: What is battery degradation?
options: When the battery completely stops working overnight
The gradual loss of battery capacity over time
A manufacturing defect in all batteries
The process of charging a battery

questions.question: What is the purpose of a Battery Management System (BMS)?
options: To monitor and protect the battery from damage
